alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Union (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 12:58AM EDT until April 01 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA...EASTERN WAYNE...UNION AND SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA...WESTERN PREBLE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO AND SOUTHWESTERN DARKE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO WILL EXPIRE AT 100 AM EDT... The storms which prompted the warning have moved out of the area. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southeastern and east central Indiana...and southwestern and west central Ohio. Please report previous wind damage or hail to the National Weather Service by going to our website at weather.gov/iln and submitting your report via social media. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for Darke, Preble, Union, Franklin and Butler counties.
